short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid Squash & Merge PRs when merging to defined branches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks the "Squash & Merge" option on GitHub pull requests. This extension allows you to define a set of branches (using regular expressions) and will prevent the "Squash and Merge" option from appearing when viewing open pull requests for those branches.
